main_definition: In English, 'ellen' doesn't directly translate as it is a Danish word. However, its most encompassing definition could be interpreted in various ways depending on the context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of measurement for length or distance
An element, aspect or feature in a broader context
meanings_and_examples.example: One of the wichtigstenellen of this project is communication.
He is tall for his age; he stands at 1.80 ellen.
